acf.egsr_quicktip: YOU HAVE THE POWER TO RAISE AN EMPIRE, BUT YOU NEED TO DIRECT YOUR FOCUS WISELY.
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOU HAVE THE POWER TO RAISE AN EMPIRE, BUT YOU NEED TO DIRECT YOUR FOCUS WISELY.

I’m sensing that you are a proud and royal soul, strong and comfortable in owning her power {FIRSTNAME}.

Something tells me you dream big, and rightly so… because your soul vibrates with enough power to build an empire.

A royal soul is driven by fulfilling its potential, its purpose…

And just like the strongest rulers throughout time, I sense your courage and strength, which you don’t allow to get sidetracked by the opinions of others.

Your enormous passion and drive reveal a soul that loves grand gestures and craves luxury and the best out of life … and is destined to have all that and more!

You’ve probably always been incredibly hard-working.

You throw all your energy into a project until it’s complete… and your soul knows the Universe is abundant…

But the amount of work you’ve put in doesn’t fully reflect in the rewards you’ve collected... yet.

I sense something blocking you reaching the giddy heights you deserve.

And I sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding reaching those lofty heights and fulfilling your true purpose for this lifetime.

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back from achieving your greatness all these years…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
YOU HAVE THE MAKINGS OF A GREAT LEADER, AND SUCCESS IS GUARANTEED… WHEN YOU TUNE INTO INNER WISDOM.

{FIRSTNAME}, your energy reading is off the charts! Intense and tireless, you have the power to be an amazing leader.

Being as strong as you are… for as long as you have been… you’ve probably done your best to ignore the negatives in life…

But... your power will backfire if you ignore your own shadows. Now is the time to do the work to process your shadows instead.

Royal souls have eyes that forever focus on their crown… this can be your greatest strength, but... it can lead to your downfall too.

{FIRSTNAME}, do you sometimes get so wrapped up in competition that you get tunnel vision?

That’s definitely understandable.

But... constant focus on your own needs puts everyone else in your shadow… which will lose you respect.

Any wise leader knows that in order to be respected, admired, and worthy of their role… they need to connect to the people they’re leading.
Collaboration has nothing to do with control.

Your energy reading suggests that to reach your peak power you must learn to listen more deeply both to others in your life and also to your inner wisdom.

In order to banish the darker energy, and raise your vibration you must connect with your wise inner guide.

This is a very critical time on your path, {FIRSTNAME}. The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

The way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading… I’d like to give you one for free but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

When you consciously and actively overcome your darker energy your light will be absolutely blinding.

And you’re destined to become the all-around beautiful, shining person you were born to be.

With your boundless capacity for love and generosity, you’ll inspire others to be the best they can be… and receive in return, all the support you need, from your followers and from the ever-abundant Universe…

Then nothing will hold you back from achieving great heights… that kingdom in the sky… that crowning glory you desire.

Your path ahead needs clarity, and you can do anything you put your mind to.
